bioAsHtml: Pierre Laporte is a Performance Engineer/performance bugs hunter at Datastax. In 2013, he gave Java Performance Tuning training to developpers with Kirk Pepperdine and has animated various performance workshop since mid-2012. He has written several articles about Java, the JVM and craftsmanship on his blog, www.pingtimeout.fr and in printed press. He currently resides in Lyon, France, and can be contacted at pierre@pingtimeout.fr
bio: Pierre Laporte is a Performance Engineer/performance bugs hunter at Datastax. In 2013, he gave Java Performance Tuning training to developpers with Kirk Pepperdine and has animated various performance workshop since mid-2012. He has written several articles about Java, the JVM and craftsmanship on his blog, www.pingtimeout.fr and in printed press. He currently resides in Lyon, France, and can be contacted at pierre@pingtimeout.fr
